description: Curated evaluation queries for Phase 1 Smartness testing

queries.query: What is the Alice two-step test for patent eligibility under 35 USC 101?
What types of claims have been found to be directed to abstract ideas under Alice step one?
How does the Mayo framework apply to method claims involving natural phenomena?
After KSR, what motivation is required to combine prior art references for obviousness?
What is the standard for claim construction under Phillips v. AWH?
What is the standard of review for Markman claim construction rulings on appeal?
What factors determine whether undue experimentation is required for enablement under Wands?
What is the written description requirement under 35 USC 112 and how is possession shown?
What are the secondary considerations of non-obviousness and how are they weighed?
How does the Federal Circuit apply the entire market value rule in patent damages?
What are the elements required to prove inequitable conduct before the CAFC?
What is the doctrine of laches in patent litigation?
When can a skilled artisan be motivated to modify prior art to reach the claimed invention?
Under what circumstances is a software patent claim considered ineligible subject matter?
What are the requirements for patent eligibility under Alice and written description under 112?
How do courts analyze obviousness and secondary considerations together in pharmaceutical cases?
What is the function-way-result test for doctrine of equivalents infringement?
What is the role of prosecution history estoppel in limiting claim scope?
What is the Nautilus standard for indefiniteness under 35 USC 112(b)?
How are means-plus-function claims construed under 35 USC 112(f)?
